control.name: icbTextLocations
control.description: This combo box allows you to specify the location of the text displayed within the navigator.

control.name: ceEnableAutoRepeat
control.description: If this check box is checked, data records are scrolled repeatedly when the navigation button is held down. Otherwise, for each click on the navigation button one record is scrolled.

control.name: ceShowToolTips
control.description: This check box controls whether the navigator can display hints when the mouse pointer is over its buttons.

control.name: ceShowCustomButtons
control.description: This check box shows or hides the custom buttons.

control.name: ceShowEditingButtons
control.description: This check box shows or hides the 'CancelEdit' and 'EndEdit' buttons.

control.name: ceShowAppendRemove
control.description: This check box shows or hides the 'Append' and 'Remove' buttons.

control.name: ceShowPageButtons
control.description: This check box shows or hides the 'PrevPage' and 'NextPage' buttons.

control.name: dataNavigatorSample
control.description: The ButtonClick event is raised when end users click the navigator's buttons. In this tutorial, this event is handled to display the type of the button clicked within the 'Button event log' memo editor.
